types:type.name: VAR
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type VAR = {| site_name: String, site_type: String, site_banner: String, site_format: String, site_street: String, site_state: String, site_zip: String, site_city: String, site_longitude: Number {"typeId": "double"}, site_latitude: Number {"typeId": "double"}, site_contact: String, site_contact_email: String, site_contact_phone: String, site_country: String, site: String, number: String, resolved_at: String, comments_and_work_notes: String, work_notes_list: String, opened_at: String, state_display_value: String, short_description: String, description: String |} {"example": "{\\\"site_name\\\":\\\"BENTONVILLE, AR - 100\\\",\\\"site_type\\\":\\\"Retail\\\",\\\"site_banner\\\":\\\"WM Supercenter\\\",\\\"site_format\\\":\\\"Hypermarket\\\",\\\"site_street\\\":\\\"406 S WALTON BLVD\\\",\\\"site_state\\\":\\\"AR\\\",\\\"site_zip\\\":\\\"72712-5705\\\",\\\"site_city\\\":\\\"BENTONVILLE\\\",\\\"site_longitude\\\":-94.224844,\\\"site_latitude\\\":36.368173,\\\"site_contact\\\":\\\"Ryan Simpson\\\",\\\"site_contact_email\\\":\\\"rws0014.s00059.us@wal-mart.com\\\",\\\"site_contact_phone\\\":\\\"4792730060\\\",\\\"site_country\\\":\\\"US\\\",\\\"site\\\":\\\"100.US\\\",\\\"number\\\":\\\"INC34329069\\\",\\\"resolved_at\\\":\\\"2023-09-15T14:30:00Z\\\",\\\"comments_and_work_notes\\\":\\\"Packsize to post all messages to...\\\",\\\"work_notes_list\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"opened_at\\\":\\\"2023-09-15T12:00:00Z\\\",\\\"state_display_value\\\":\\\"Resolved\\\",\\\"short_description\\\":\\\"Network issue at the site\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"There was a network issue at the Bentonville site affecting transactions...\\\"}"}

types:type.name: Contact
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Contact = {| FirstName: String, LastName: String, Email: String, Phone: String |} {"example": "{\\\"FirstName\\\":\\\"Nikhil\\\",\\\"LastName\\\":\\\"Acharya\\\",\\\"Email\\\":\\\"nikhil.acharya@packsize.com\\\",\\\"Phone\\\":\\\"9841002008\\\"}"}
